bookTitle: Moscow to the End of the Line
bookAuthors: Venedikt Erofeev, H.W. Tjalsma, Ali R覺za D覺r覺k, Ali R覺za Dink
Plot: In this classic of Russian humor and social commentary, a fired cable fitter goes on a binge and hops a train to Petushki (where his "most beloved of trollops" awaits). On the way he bestows upon angels, fellow passengers, and the world at large a magnificent monologue on alcohol, politics, society, alcohol, philosophy, the pains of love, and, of course, alcohol.
